title: mac 7.9 issues
body:
There seems to be many bugs that came with the 7.9 patch and these bugs only seem to be affecting mac users. Personally im only experiencing two major issues.

1. my fps is only maxed out at 60 fps whereas before it was 150-200 fps
2. i play on borderless so i can tab out and see how loud the volume is but when im in borderless in 7.9  there is a ring outside where i can see my desktop making it not-borderless

someone fix this as i wanted to play dark star kha over the weekend :') thanks fam

(here is a screenshot of the 60fps and the non-borderless - http://imgur.com/a/yEBPM)

replies.body:
I've seen a few reports here regarding the fps issue for mac users, and it's being looked into.  I don't have any information on it right now, but the details were forwarded to interested parties for review and is currently a known issue. 

The borderless issue may be due to the current custom resolution issues we've been having for both mac and pc players.  The current workaround is to toggle into a windowed mode instead via Alt+Enter while in game.  I don't have an eta, but a more permanent fix is in the works!
thank you :) do you know when this might be fixed? maybe next patch?
yep.. thats exactly how it look.
